about_the_game:
《源战役》is an urban sci-fi adventure theme of 3D star traversal type MMORPG game, the game background of the cosmic space-time rupture, the source of the experiment declared a failure, the energy emergency, the source of the power of the war is bound to take place!

【GamePlay】

1、3D Unreal Engine for a Cyber Universe
Exquisite modeling to restore the charm of the role, the future scene to build a deep immersion, cyberpunk style world high degree of freedom to play; sci-fi style Boss, equipped with unique mechanical devices, the future of science and technology is full of sense. Combination of sci-fi cyberpunk and 3D, distinguishing the game from other major categories more recognizable.


2、Hand-operated combat, experience the real battlefield
Delicate interactive scenes, magnificent battle effects, excellent numerical system, bring host game experience, fingertip operation, you can enter the real battlefield.


3、Free group BOSS
Every player can team up to participate in the limited time event, and you can get a lot of rewards after clearing the level!


4、Planet Cyber More Rides
The mount system is huge, and the mount skins are free to get, a cool and extraordinary experience!


5、Fashion and Illusion of Martial Arts Change at will
Each character has a wide range of fashion and weapon shapes, which are available during the event.

【GamePlay】

1、3D Unreal Engine for a Cyber Universe
Exquisite modeling to restore the charm of the role, the future scene to build a deep immersion, cyberpunk style world high degree of freedom to play; sci-fi style Boss, equipped with unique mechanical devices, the future of science and technology is full of sense. Combination of sci-fi cyberpunk and 3D, distinguishing the game from other major categories more recognizable.


2、Hand-operated combat, experience the real battlefield
Delicate interactive scenes, magnificent battle effects, excellent numerical system, bring host game experience, fingertip operation, you can enter the real battlefield.


3、Free group BOSS
Every player can team up to participate in the limited time event, and you can get a lot of rewards after clearing the level!


4、Planet Cyber More Rides
The mount system is huge, and the mount skins are free to get, a cool and extraordinary experience!

Each character has a wide range of fashion and weapon shapes, which are available during the event.
name: 源战役

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7-win11
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7-win11
  • Processor: 1Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: soundblaster
